title: Voodoo Doctor Yorick
body:
Hi, my name is **BOTClatence**,
Since the new  {{champion:83}}  update has just arrived, I looked at one of his skins and thought to myself, this would be a cool skin with a few different details but a whole new skin. Voodoo Doctor sprang to mind and that's what I shall try to create. Not sure how the discussions work but, give it a thumbs up or down, or give your opinion on the thought. (Will start making the basis of my idea of 'Voodoo Doctor Yorick).

**GLHF Summoners**

All feedback will be taken into consideration
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: Crazy Cat Lady Yorick is a thing that needs to happen.

Riot actually cancelled a champion called 'Tabu' who was the Voodoo Shaman, and this reminds me of it, although his design isn't nearly as paralleled to Yorick's current theme, I believe this would be suitable if executed in the right way :P

{{champion:83}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:83}}
**Also not sure what program to use, if someone would like to suggest one that would be great!**
